overview: During a ladies night out, Feisty Viv, Boozy Angie, Dotty Doris & shy Jenny bump into Bruce, otherwise known locally as drag artist, Gyrating Rocket! As they get to know him/her more, they are dazzled, surprised and delighted by their new friend who shows them all that first impressions are not all they seem to be and that stockings are a nightmare even for men! And just wait till Fluffy Flo arrives!
title: Gyrating Rocket
